title: Nigerian presidential rival Atiku watching Buhari inauguration on TV? Photo is fake

In the photoshopped image, the football match on the TV screen has been replaced with a scene from the inauguration.

There has to be a way to hold to account, those who mislead Nigerians. Same platform, same real and photoshopped image.” –
